code: import React from'react';import{useTranslation}from'react-i18next';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LanguageSwitcher=()=>{const{i18n}=useTranslation();const languages=[{code:'uz',name:'O\'zbekcha',flag:'🇺🇿'},{code:'ru',name:'Русский',flag:'🇷🇺'},{code:'en',name:'English',flag:'🇺🇸'}];const currentLanguage=languages.find(lang=>lang.code===i18n.language)||languages[0];const changeLanguage=langCode=>{i18n.changeLanguage(langCode);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dropdown",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"btn btn-outline-light btn-sm dropdown-toggle d-flex align-items-center",type:"button","data-bs-toggle":"dropdown","aria-expanded":"false",style:{border:'1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)',borderRadius:'8px',padding:'6px 12px',fontSize:'14px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"me-2",children:currentLanguage.flag}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"d-none d-md-inline",children:currentLanguage.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"d-inline d-md-none",children:currentLanguage.code.toUpperCase()})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"dropdown-menu dropdown-menu-end",style:{minWidth:'150px'},children:languages.map(language=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:`dropdown-item d-flex align-items-center ${i18n.language===language.code?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>changeLanguage(language.code),style:{padding:'8px 16px',fontSize:'14px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"me-2",children:language.flag}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:language.name}),i18n.language===language.code&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-check-circle-fill ms-auto text-primary"})]})},language.code))})]});};export default LanguageSwitcher;
